request.description: Submit 10 delivery orders from various locations in Delhi NCR region with mixed priorities

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Submit 3 delivery vehicles stationed at major hubs in Delhi NCR
Generate optimized dispatch plan based on submitted orders and vehicles

response.name: Success Response
